001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
004
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class PoolingLayer {
009
010    private final ConvolutionalShape inputShape;
011    private final ConvolutionalShape outputShape;
012    private final List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters;
013    private final int stride;
014    private final int padding;
015
016    public static PoolingLayer create(int width, int height, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
017        return create(width, height, 1, activationFunction);
018    }
019
020    public static PoolingLayer create(int width, int height, int depth, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
021        return create(width, height, depth, 3, 1, 0, activationFunction);
022    }
023
024    public static PoolingLayer create(int width, int height, int depth, int size, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
025        ConvolutionalShape inputShape = new ConvolutionalShape(width, height, depth, 1, null);
026        return create(inputShape, size, stride, padding, 1, activationFunction);
027    }
028
029    public static PoolingLayer create(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, int size, int dimensions, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
030        int outputWidth = (inputShape.getWidth() - size + 2 * padding) / stride + 1;
031        int outputHeight = (inputShape.getHeight() - size + 2 * padding) / stride + 1;
032        ConvolutionalShape outputShape = new ConvolutionalShape(outputWidth, outputHeight, dimensions, 1, null);
033        return create(inputShape, outputShape, dimensions, stride, padding, activationFunction);
034    }
035
036    public static PoolingLayer create(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, ConvolutionalShape outputShape, int size, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
037        List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
038        for (int i = 0; i < outputShape.getChannels(); i++) {
039            filters.add(ConvolutionalFilter.create(size, inputShape.getChannels()));
040        }
041        return new PoolingLayer(inputShape, outputShape, filters, stride, padding);
042    }
043
044    private PoolingLayer(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, ConvolutionalShape outputShape, List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters, int stride, int padding) {
045        this.inputShape = inputShape;
046        this.outputShape = outputShape;
047        this.filters = filters;
048        this.stride = stride;
049        this.padding = padding;
050    }
051
052    public ConvolutionalShape getInputShape() {
053        return inputShape;
054    }
055
056    public ConvolutionalShape getOutputShape() {
057        return outputShape;
058    }
059
060    public List<ConvolutionalFilter> getFilters() {
061        return filters;
062    }
063
064    public int getStride() {
065        return stride;
066    }
067
068    public int getPadding() {
069        return padding;
070    }
071
072    public int getDimensions() {
073        return filters.size();
074    }
075
076    public ConvolutionalShape transform(ConvolutionalShape input) {
077        ConvolutionalShape output = getOutputShape().clone();
078        for (int d = 0; d < getDimensions(); d++) {
079            ConvolutionalFilter filter = filters.get(d);
080            for (int y = 0; y < output.getHeight(); y++) {
081                for (int x = 0; x < output.getWidth(); x++) {
082                    for (Float[] field : getFields(input, output)) {
083                        float value = filter.estimate(field)[0];
084                        output.setPixel(value, x, y, d + 1);
085                    }
086                }
087            }
088        }
089        return output;
090    }
091
092    private List<Float[]> getFields(ConvolutionalShape input, ConvolutionalShape output) {
093        if (filters.isEmpty()) {
094            return List.of();
095        }
096        ConvolutionalShape filterSize = filters.getFirst().getShape();
097        List<Float[]> fields = new ArrayList<>();
098        for (int x = -padding; x < output.getWidth() - filterSize.getWidth() + padding; x = x + stride) {
099            for (int y = -padding; y < input.getWidth() - filterSize.getHeight() + padding; y = y + stride) {
100                for (int c = 1; c <= input.getChannels(); c++) {
101                    for (int i = 0; i < input.getCount(); i++) {
102                        ConvolutionalShape fieldShape = filterSize.clone();
103                        for (int yi = 0; yi < fieldShape.getHeight(); yi++) {
104                            for (int xi = 0; xi < fieldShape.getWidth(); xi++) {
105                                float value;
106                                if (x + xi < 0 || x + xi >= input.getWidth() || y + yi < 0 || y + yi >= input.getHeight()) {
107                                    value = 0f;
108                                } else {
109                                    value = input.getPixel(x + xi, y + yi, c, i);
110                                }
111                                fieldShape.setPixel(value, xi, yi, c, i);
112                            }
113                        }
114                        fields.add(fieldShape.getPixels());
115                    }
116                }
117            }
118        }
119        return fields;
120    }
121}
